entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Tetsa River (Provincial Park)
entry.summary: No watches or warnings in effect.

entry.title: Wednesday night: Mainly cloudy. Low minus 5.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Periods of snow over eastern sections this evening. Local amount 5 cm over eastern sections. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 5. Wind chill minus 7 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Wednesday 19 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High plus 2. POP 70%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 70 percent chance of flurries late in the morning and in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 7 in the morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Wednesday 19 April 2023
